sentences.en: Among the most spectacular sights are the great sea-bird colonies.
sentences.cn: 庞大的海鸟群是最壮观的景象之一。

sentences.en: Eleanor's work among the women will, I trust, bear fruit.
sentences.cn: 我相信埃莉诺所做的工作会在妇女中有所成效。

sentences.en: His pitching was a legend among major league hitters.
sentences.cn: 他的投球在大联盟的击球员中是个传奇。

sentences.en: Hundreds of tightly rolled newspapers were set aflame among the 50,000 crowd.
sentences.cn: 几百张卷紧的报纸在为数5万的人群中被点燃。

sentences.en: I could hear voices coming from somewhere among the bushes.
sentences.cn: 我能听到灌木丛中某个地方传来说话的声音。

sentences.en: Infectious diseases are spreading among many of the flood victims.
sentences.cn: 传染病正在遭受洪灾的很多灾民中蔓延。

sentences.en: Innocent civilians were among the casualties.
sentences.cn: 死伤者中有无辜平民。

sentences.en: Its shops are among the most stylish on the Continent.
sentences.cn: 其店铺跻身欧陆最时尚的店铺之列。

sentences.en: Jim relaxed, knowing he was among friends .
sentences.cn: 吉姆知道周围都是朋友，放松了下来。

sentences.en: My grandfather had among his possessions a portrait by Matisse.
sentences.cn: 我祖父有一幅马蒂斯画的肖像画。

sentences.en: Radical feminism is currently the fashionable topic among the chattering classes.
sentences.cn: 激进的女权主义是时下名嘴阶层热议的话题。

sentences.en: Remove the meat with a fork and divide it among four plates.
sentences.cn: 用餐叉把肉叉走，分到4个盘里。

sentences.en: Representatives were chosen by the students from among themselves.
sentences.cn: 代表由学生内部选举产生。

sentences.en: She began rummaging among the books on her desk.
sentences.cn: 她开始在桌子上的一堆书中乱翻起来。

sentences.en: She knew that she was an object of pity among her friends.
sentences.cn: 她知道自己是朋友们同情的对象。

sentences.en: She looked at Miss Melville, snugly ensconced among her new friends.
sentences.cn: 她看了看梅尔维尔小姐，她正舒适地安坐在新朋友中间。

sentences.en: She travels con-stantly, moving among her several residences around the world.
sentences.cn: 她经常旅行，穿梭于她在世界各地的多处住所。

sentences.en: She was the eldest among them.
sentences.cn: 她是他们当中年纪最大的。

sentences.en: The Coptic Church is among the oldest churches of Christianity.
sentences.cn: 科普特教会是最古老的基督教会之一。

sentences.en: The girl quickly disappeared among the crowd.
sentences.cn: 女孩转眼消失在人群中。

sentences.en: The house stands on a shelf of rock among pines.
sentences.cn: 房子矗立在松树丛中一块突出的岩石上。

sentences.en: The results show the level of frustration among hospital doctors.
sentences.cn: 这些结果显示了医院医生的不满程度。

sentences.en: There is a certain impatience among some of the soldiers.
sentences.cn: 有些士兵有点儿不耐烦。

sentences.en: We walked among the chestnut woods on the mountain slopes.
sentences.cn: 我们走在山坡上的栗树林中。

phrases.tran_cn: 其中；尤其；除了别的之外

trans.tran_cn: 为…所围绕，在…中，与…在一起，是…之一，与…一样
trans.tran_en: in or through the middle of a group of people or things
